InputFile.name: InputFile
description: This object represents the contents of a file to be uploaded. Must be posted using multipart/form-data in the usual way that files are uploaded via the browser.

InputPaidMedia.name: InputPaidMedia
description: This object describes the paid media to be sent. Currently, it can be one of
- InputPaidMediaPhoto
- InputPaidMediaVideo

InputPaidMediaPhoto.name: InputPaidMediaPhoto
description: The paid media to send is a photo.

fields.name: type

fields.name: media
fields.description: File to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, or pass "attach://<file_attach_name>" to upload a new one using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. More information on Sending Files: https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#sending-files

InputPaidMediaVideo.name: InputPaidMediaVideo
description: The paid media to send is a video.

fields.name: type

fields.name: media
fields.description: File to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, or pass "attach://<file_attach_name>" to upload a new one using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. More information on Sending Files: https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#sending-files

fields.description: Optional. Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail's width and height should not exceed 320. Ignored if the file is not uploaded using multipart/form-data. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, or pass "attach://<file_attach_name>" to upload a new one using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. More information on Sending Files: https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#sending-files

fields.name: start_timestamp
fields.description: Optional. Start timestamp for the video in the message

fields.name: width
fields.description: Optional. Video width

fields.name: height
fields.description: Optional. Video height

fields.name: duration
fields.description: Optional. Video duration in seconds

fields.name: supports_streaming
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if the uploaded video is suitable for streaming

Sticker.name: Sticker
description: This object represents a sticker.

fields.name: file_id
fields.description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file

fields.name: file_unique_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the sticker, currently one of "regular", "mask", "custom_emoji". The type of the sticker is independent from its format, which is determined by the fields is_animated and is_video.

fields.name: width
fields.description: Sticker width

fields.name: height
fields.description: Sticker height

fields.name: is_animated
fields.description: True, if the sticker is animated

fields.name: is_video
fields.description: True, if the sticker is a video sticker

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: Optional. Sticker thumbnail in the .WEBP or .JPG format

fields.name: emoji
fields.description: Optional. Emoji associated with the sticker

fields.name: set_name
fields.description: Optional. Name of the sticker set to which the sticker belongs

fields.name: premium_animation
fields.description: Optional. For premium regular stickers, premium animation for the sticker

fields.name: mask_position
fields.description: Optional. For mask stickers, the position where the mask should be placed

fields.name: custom_emoji_id
fields.description: Optional. For custom emoji stickers, unique identifier of the custom emoji

fields.name: needs_repainting
fields.description: Optional. True, if the sticker must be repainted to a text color in messages, the color of the Telegram Premium badge in emoji status, white color on chat photos, or another appropriate color in other places

fields.name: file_size
fields.description: Optional. File size in bytes

StickerSet.name: StickerSet
description: This object represents a sticker set.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Sticker set name

fields.name: title
fields.description: Sticker set title

fields.name: sticker_type
fields.description: Type of stickers in the set, currently one of "regular", "mask", "custom_emoji"

fields.name: stickers
fields.description: List of all set stickers

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: Optional. Sticker set thumbnail in the .WEBP, .TGS, or .WEBM format

MaskPosition.name: MaskPosition
description: This object describes the position on faces where a mask should be placed by default.

fields.name: point
fields.description: The part of the face relative to which the mask should be placed. One of "forehead", "eyes", "mouth", or "chin".

fields.name: x_shift
fields.description: Shift by X-axis measured in widths of the mask scaled to the face size, from left to right. For example, choosing -1.0 will place mask just to the left of the default mask position.

fields.name: y_shift
fields.description: Shift by Y-axis measured in heights of the mask scaled to the face size, from top to bottom. For example, 1.0 will place the mask just below the default mask position.

fields.name: scale
fields.description: Mask scaling coefficient. For example, 2.0 means double size.

InputSticker.name: InputSticker
description: This object describes a sticker to be added to a sticker set.

fields.name: sticker
fields.description: The added sticker. Pass a file_id as a String to send a file that already exists on the Telegram servers, pass an HTTP URL as a String for Telegram to get a file from the Internet, upload a new one using multipart/form-data, or pass "attach://<file_attach_name>" to upload a new one using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name> name. Animated and video stickers can't be uploaded via HTTP URL. More information on Sending Files: https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#sending-files

fields.name: format
fields.description: Format of the added sticker, must be one of "static" for a .WEBP or .PNG image, "animated" for a .TGS animation, "video" for a .WEBM video

fields.name: emoji_list
fields.description: List of 1-20 emoji associated with the sticker

fields.name: mask_position
fields.description: Optional. Position where the mask should be placed on faces. For "mask" stickers only.

fields.name: keywords
fields.description: Optional. List of 0-20 search keywords for the sticker with total length of up to 64 characters. For "regular" and "custom_emoji" stickers only.

Gift.name: Gift
description: This object represents a gift that can be sent by the bot.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the gift

fields.name: sticker
fields.description: The sticker that represents the gift

fields.name: star_count
fields.description: The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to send the sticker

fields.name: upgrade_star_count
fields.description: Optional. The number of Telegram Stars that must be paid to upgrade the gift to a unique one

fields.name: total_count
fields.description: Optional. The total number of the gifts of this type that can be sent; for limited gifts only

fields.name: remaining_count
fields.description: Optional. The number of remaining gifts of this type that can be sent; for limited gifts only

Gifts.name: Gifts
description: This object represent a list of gifts.

fields.name: gifts
fields.description: The list of gifts

InlineQuery.name: InlineQuery
description: This object represents an incoming inline query. When the user sends an empty query, your bot could return some default or trending results.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for this query

fields.name: from
fields.description: Sender

fields.name: query
fields.description: Text of the query (up to 256 characters)

fields.name: offset
fields.description: Offset of the results to be returned, can be controlled by the bot

fields.name: chat_type
fields.description: Optional. Type of the chat from which the inline query was sent. Can be either "sender" for a private chat with the inline query sender, "private", "group", "supergroup", or "channel". The chat type should be always known for requests sent from official clients and most third-party clients, unless the request was sent from a secret chat

fields.name: location
fields.description: Optional. Sender location, only for bots that request user location

InlineQueryResultsButton.name: InlineQueryResultsButton
description: This object represents a button to be shown above inline query results. You must use exactly one of the optional fields.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Label text on the button

fields.name: web_app
fields.description: Optional. Description of the Web App that will be launched when the user presses the button. The Web App will be able to switch back to the inline mode using the method switchInlineQuery inside the Web App.

fields.name: start_parameter
fields.description: Optional. Deep-linking parameter for the /start message sent to the bot when a user presses the button. 1-64 characters, only A-Z, a-z, 0-9, _ and - are allowed. Example: An inline bot that sends YouTube videos can ask the user to connect the bot to their YouTube account to adapt search results accordingly. To do this, it displays a 'Connect your YouTube account' button above the results, or even before showing any. The user presses the button, switches to a private chat with the bot and, in doing so, passes a start parameter that instructs the bot to return an OAuth link. Once done, the bot can offer a switch_inline button so that the user can easily return to the chat where they wanted to use the bot's inline capabilities.

InlineQueryResult.name: InlineQueryResult
description: This object represents one result of an inline query. Telegram clients currently support results of the following 20 types:
- InlineQueryResultCachedAudio
- InlineQueryResultCachedDocument
- InlineQueryResultCachedGif
- InlineQueryResultCachedMpeg4Gif
- InlineQueryResultCachedPhoto
- InlineQueryResultCachedSticker
- InlineQueryResultCachedVideo
- InlineQueryResultCachedVoice
- InlineQueryResultArticle
- InlineQueryResultAudio
- InlineQueryResultContact
- InlineQueryResultGame
- InlineQueryResultDocument
- InlineQueryResultGif
- InlineQueryResultLocation
- InlineQueryResultMpeg4Gif
- InlineQueryResultPhoto
- InlineQueryResultVenue
- InlineQueryResultVideo
- InlineQueryResultVoice
Note: All URLs passed in inline query results will be available to end users and therefore must be assumed to be public.

InlineQueryResultArticle.name: InlineQueryResultArticle

fields.description: Content of the message to be sent

fields.name: reply_markup

fields.name: description

fields.name: thumbnail_url

fields.name: thumbnail_width

fields.name: thumbnail_height

fields.name: thumbnail_url
fields.description: URL of the thumbnail for the photo

fields.name: photo_width

fields.name: photo_height

fields.name: title

fields.name: description
fields.description: Optional. Short description of the result

fields.name: caption

fields.name: parse_mode
fields.description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the photo caption. See formatting options for more details.

fields.name: caption_entities
fields.description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode

fields.name: show_caption_above_media
fields.description: Optional. Pass True, if the caption must be shown above the message media

fields.name: reply_markup
fields.description: Optional. Inline keyboard attached to the message

fields.name: input_message_content
fields.description: Optional. Content of the message to be sent instead of the photo

InlineQueryResultGif.name: InlineQueryResultGif
description: Represents a link to an animated GIF file. By default, this animated GIF file will be sent by the user with optional caption. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the animation.

fields.description: Type of the result, must be gif

fields.name: gif_width

fields.name: gif_height

fields.name: gif_duration

fields.name: thumbnail_url
fields.description: URL of the static (JPEG or GIF) or animated (MPEG4) thumbnail for the result

fields.name: thumbnail_mime_type
fields.description: Optional. MIME type of the thumbnail, must be one of "image/jpeg", "image/gif", or "video/mp4". Defaults to "image/jpeg"

fields.name: title
fields.description: Optional. Title for the result

fields.name: caption
fields.description: Optional. Caption of the GIF file to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing

fields.description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the caption. See formatting options for more details.

fields.name: caption_entities

fields.name: show_caption_above_media
fields.description: Optional. Pass True, if the caption must be shown above the message media

fields.name: reply_markup
fields.description: Optional. Inline keyboard attached to the message

fields.name: input_message_content
fields.description: Optional. Content of the message to be sent instead of the GIF animation

InlineQueryResultMpeg4Gif.name: InlineQueryResultMpeg4Gif
description: Represents a link to a video animation (H.264/MPEG-4 AVC video without sound). By default, this animated MPEG-4 file will be sent by the user with optional caption. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the animation.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the result, must be mpeg4_gif

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes

fields.name: mpeg4_height

fields.name: mpeg4_duration

fields.name: thumbnail_mime_type
fields.description: Optional. MIME type of the thumbnail, must be one of "image/jpeg", "image/gif", or "video/mp4". Defaults to "image/jpeg"

fields.name: title
fields.description: Optional. Title for the result

fields.name: caption
fields.description: Optional. Caption of the MPEG-4 file to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing

fields.name: parse_mode
fields.description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the caption. See formatting options for more details.

fields.name: caption_entities
fields.description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode

fields.name: show_caption_above_media
fields.description: Optional. Pass True, if the caption must be shown above the message media

fields.name: reply_markup

InlineQueryResultVideo.name: InlineQueryResultVideo

fields.name: thumbnail_url
fields.description: URL of the thumbnail (JPEG only) for the video

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title for the result

fields.name: caption
fields.description: Optional. Caption of the video to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing

fields.name: parse_mode
fields.description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the video caption. See formatting options for more details.

fields.name: caption_entities
fields.description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode

fields.name: show_caption_above_media

fields.name: video_width

fields.name: video_height
fields.description: Optional. Video height

fields.name: video_duration
fields.description: Optional. Video duration in seconds

fields.name: description
fields.description: Optional. Short description of the result

fields.name: reply_markup
fields.description: Optional. Inline keyboard attached to the message

fields.name: input_message_content
fields.description: Optional. Content of the message to be sent instead of the video. This field is required if InlineQueryResultVideo is used to send an HTML-page as a result (e.g., a YouTube video).

InlineQueryResultAudio.name: InlineQueryResultAudio
description: Represents a link to an MP3 audio file. By default, this audio file will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the audio.

fields.name: type

fields.name: id

fields.name: title

fields.name: caption

fields.name: parse_mode
fields.description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the audio caption. See formatting options for more details.

fields.name: caption_entities

fields.name: performer

InlineQueryResultDocument.name: InlineQueryResultDocument
description: Represents a link to a file. By default, this file will be sent by the user with an optional caption. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the file. Currently, only .PDF and .ZIP files can be sent using this method.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the result, must be document

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title for the result

fields.name: caption
fields.description: Optional. Caption of the document to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing

fields.name: parse_mode
fields.description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the document caption. See formatting options for more details.

fields.name: caption_entities
fields.description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode

fields.name: document_url
fields.description: A valid URL for the file

fields.name: mime_type
fields.description: MIME type of the content of the file, either "application/pdf" or "application/zip"

fields.name: description
fields.description: Optional. Short description of the result

fields.name: reply_markup
fields.description: Optional. Inline keyboard attached to the message

fields.name: input_message_content
fields.description: Optional. Content of the message to be sent instead of the file

fields.name: thumbnail_url

fields.name: thumbnail_width
fields.description: Optional. Thumbnail width

fields.name: thumbnail_height

InlineQueryResultLocation.name: InlineQueryResultLocation
description: Represents a location on a map. By default, the location will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the location.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the result, must be location

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 Bytes

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Location latitude in degrees

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Location longitude in degrees

fields.name: title
fields.description: Location title

fields.name: horizontal_accuracy
fields.description: Optional. The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters; 0-1500

fields.name: live_period
fields.description: Optional. Period in seconds during which the location can be updated, should be between 60 and 86400, or 0x7FFFFFFF for live locations that can be edited indefinitely.

fields.name: heading
fields.description: Optional. For live locations, a direction in which the user is moving, in degrees. Must be between 1 and 360 if specified.

fields.name: proximity_alert_radius
fields.description: Optional. For live locations, a maximum distance for proximity alerts about approaching another chat member, in meters. Must be between 1 and 100000 if specified.

fields.name: reply_markup

InputMessageContent.name: InputMessageContent
description: This object represents the content of a message to be sent as a result of an inline query. Telegram clients currently support the following 5 types:
- InputTextMessageContent
- InputLocationMessageContent
- InputVenueMessageContent
- InputContactMessageContent
- InputInvoiceMessageContent

InputTextMessageContent.name: InputTextMessageContent
description: Represents the content of a text message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

fields.name: message_text
fields.description: Text of the message to be sent, 1-4096 characters

fields.name: parse_mode
fields.description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See formatting options for more details.

fields.name: entities
fields.description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of parse_mode

fields.name: link_preview_options
fields.description: Optional. Link preview generation options for the message

InputLocationMessageContent.name: InputLocationMessageContent
description: Represents the content of a location message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the location in degrees

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the location in degrees

fields.name: horizontal_accuracy
fields.description: Optional. The radius of uncertainty for the location, measured in meters; 0-1500

fields.name: live_period
fields.description: Optional. Period in seconds during which the location can be updated, should be between 60 and 86400, or 0x7FFFFFFF for live locations that can be edited indefinitely.

fields.name: heading
fields.description: Optional. For live locations, a direction in which the user is moving, in degrees. Must be between 1 and 360 if specified.

fields.name: proximity_alert_radius
fields.description: Optional. For live locations, a maximum distance for proximity alerts about approaching another chat member, in meters. Must be between 1 and 100000 if specified.

InputVenueMessageContent.name: InputVenueMessageContent
description: Represents the content of a venue message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the venue in degrees

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the venue in degrees

fields.name: title
fields.description: Name of the venue

fields.name: address
fields.description: Address of the venue

fields.name: foursquare_id
fields.description: Optional. Foursquare identifier of the venue, if known

fields.name: foursquare_type
fields.description: Optional. Foursquare type of the venue, if known. (For example, "arts_entertainment/default", "arts_entertainment/aquarium" or "food/icecream".)

fields.name: google_place_id
fields.description: Optional. Google Places identifier of the venue

fields.name: google_place_type
fields.description: Optional. Google Places type of the venue. (See supported types.)

InputContactMessageContent.name: InputContactMessageContent
description: Represents the content of a contact message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

fields.name: phone_number
fields.description: Contact's phone number

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: Contact's first name

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: Optional. Contact's last name

fields.name: vcard
fields.description: Optional. Additional data about the contact in the form of a vCard, 0-2048 bytes

InputInvoiceMessageContent.name: InputInvoiceMessageContent
description: Represents the content of an invoice message to be sent as the result of an inline query.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Product name, 1-32 characters

fields.name: description
fields.description: Product description, 1-255 characters

fields.name: payload
fields.description: Bot-defined invoice payload, 1-128 bytes. This will not be displayed to the user, use it for your internal processes.

fields.name: provider_token
fields.description: Optional. Payment provider token, obtained via @BotFather. Pass an empty string for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, see more on currencies. Pass "XTR" for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: prices
fields.description: Price breakdown, a JSON-serialized list of components (e.g. product price, tax, discount, delivery cost, delivery tax, bonus, etc.). Must contain exactly one item for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: max_tip_amount
fields.description: Optional. The maximum accepted amount for tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a maximum tip of US$ 1.45 pass max_tip_amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies). Defaults to 0. Not supported for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: suggested_tip_amounts
fields.description: Optional. A JSON-serialized array of suggested amounts of tip in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). At most 4 suggested tip amounts can be specified. The suggested tip amounts must be positive, passed in a strictly increased order and must not exceed max_tip_amount.

fields.name: provider_data
fields.description: Optional. A JSON-serialized object for data about the invoice, which will be shared with the payment provider. A detailed description of the required fields should be provided by the payment provider.

fields.name: photo_url
fields.description: Optional. URL of the product photo for the invoice. Can be a photo of the goods or a marketing image for a service.

fields.name: photo_size
fields.description: Optional. Photo size in bytes

fields.name: photo_width
fields.description: Optional. Photo width

fields.name: photo_height
fields.description: Optional. Photo height

fields.name: need_name
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if you require the user's full name to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: need_phone_number
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if you require the user's phone number to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: need_email
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if you require the user's email address to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: need_shipping_address
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if you require the user's shipping address to complete the order. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: send_phone_number_to_provider
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if the user's phone number should be sent to the provider. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: send_email_to_provider
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if the user's email address should be sent to the provider. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.

fields.name: is_flexible
fields.description: Optional. Pass True if the final price depends on the shipping method. Ignored for payments in Telegram Stars.

ChosenInlineResult.name: ChosenInlineResult
description: Represents a result of an inline query that was chosen by the user and sent to their chat partner.
Note: It is necessary to enable inline feedback via @BotFather in order to receive these objects in updates.

fields.name: result_id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the result that was chosen

fields.name: from
fields.description: The user that chose the result

fields.name: location
fields.description: Optional. Sender location, only for bots that require user location

fields.name: inline_message_id
fields.description: Optional. Identifier of the sent inline message. Available only if there is an inline keyboard attached to the message. Will be also received in callback queries and can be used to edit the message.

fields.name: query
fields.description: The query that was used to obtain the result

SentWebAppMessage.name: SentWebAppMessage
description: Describes an inline message sent by a Web App on behalf of a user.

fields.name: inline_message_id
fields.description: Optional. Identifier of the sent inline message. Available only if there is an inline keyboard attached to the message.

PreparedInlineMessage.name: PreparedInlineMessage
description: Describes an inline message to be sent by a user of a Mini App.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the prepared message

fields.name: expiration_date
fields.description: Expiration date of the prepared message, in Unix time. Expired prepared messages can no longer be used

LabeledPrice.name: LabeledPrice
description: This object represents a portion of the price for goods or services.

fields.name: label
fields.description: Portion label

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Price of the product in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

Invoice.name: Invoice
description: This object contains basic information about an invoice.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Product name

fields.name: description
fields.description: Product description

fields.name: start_parameter
fields.description: Unique bot deep-linking parameter that can be used to generate this invoice

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, or "XTR" for payments in Telegram Stars

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

ShippingAddress.name: ShippingAddress
description: This object represents a shipping address.

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: Two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code

fields.name: state
fields.description: State, if applicable

fields.name: city
fields.description: City

fields.name: street_line1
fields.description: First line for the address

fields.name: street_line2
fields.description: Second line for the address

fields.name: post_code
fields.description: Address post code

OrderInfo.name: OrderInfo
description: This object represents information about an order.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Optional. User name

fields.name: phone_number
fields.description: Optional. User's phone number

fields.name: email
fields.description: Optional. User email

fields.name: shipping_address
fields.description: Optional. User shipping address

ShippingOption.name: ShippingOption
description: This object represents one shipping option.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Shipping option identifier

fields.name: title
fields.description: Option title

fields.name: prices
fields.description: List of price portions

SuccessfulPayment.name: SuccessfulPayment
description: This object contains basic information about a successful payment. Note that if the buyer initiates a chargeback with the relevant payment provider following this transaction, the funds may be debited from your balance. This is outside of Telegram's control.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, or "XTR" for payments in Telegram Stars

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

fields.name: invoice_payload
fields.description: Bot-specified invoice payload

fields.name: subscription_expiration_date
fields.description: Optional. Expiration date of the subscription, in Unix time; for recurring payments only

fields.name: is_recurring
fields.description: Optional. True, if the payment is a recurring payment for a subscription

fields.name: is_first_recurring
fields.description: Optional. True, if the payment is the first payment for a subscription

fields.name: shipping_option_id
fields.description: Optional. Identifier of the shipping option chosen by the user

fields.name: order_info
fields.description: Optional. Order information provided by the user

fields.name: telegram_payment_charge_id
fields.description: Telegram payment identifier

fields.name: provider_payment_charge_id
fields.description: Provider payment identifier

RefundedPayment.name: RefundedPayment
description: This object contains basic information about a refunded payment.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, or "XTR" for payments in Telegram Stars. Currently, always "XTR"

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total refunded price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45, total_amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

fields.name: invoice_payload
fields.description: Bot-specified invoice payload

fields.name: telegram_payment_charge_id
fields.description: Telegram payment identifier

fields.name: provider_payment_charge_id
fields.description: Optional. Provider payment identifier

ShippingQuery.name: ShippingQuery
description: This object contains information about an incoming shipping query.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique query identifier

fields.name: from
fields.description: User who sent the query

fields.name: invoice_payload
fields.description: Bot-specified invoice payload

fields.name: shipping_address
fields.description: User specified shipping address

PreCheckoutQuery.name: PreCheckoutQuery
description: This object contains information about an incoming pre-checkout query.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique query identifier

fields.name: from
fields.description: User who sent the query

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, or "XTR" for payments in Telegram Stars

fields.name: total_amount
fields.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).

fields.name: invoice_payload
fields.description: Bot-specified invoice payload

fields.name: shipping_option_id
fields.description: Optional. Identifier of the shipping option chosen by the user

fields.name: order_info
fields.description: Optional. Order information provided by the user

PaidMediaPurchased.name: PaidMediaPurchased
description: This object contains information about a paid media purchase.

fields.name: from
fields.description: User who purchased the media

fields.name: paid_media_payload
fields.description: Bot-specified paid media payload

RevenueWithdrawalState.name: RevenueWithdrawalState
description: This object describes the state of a revenue withdrawal operation. Currently, it can be one of
- RevenueWithdrawalStatePending
- RevenueWithdrawalStateSucceeded
- RevenueWithdrawalStateFailed

RevenueWithdrawalStatePending.name: RevenueWithdrawalStatePending
description: The withdrawal is in progress.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the state, always "pending"

RevenueWithdrawalStateSucceeded.name: RevenueWithdrawalStateSucceeded
description: The withdrawal succeeded.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the state, always "succeeded"

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date the withdrawal was completed in Unix time

fields.name: url
fields.description: An HTTPS URL that can be used to see transaction details

RevenueWithdrawalStateFailed.name: RevenueWithdrawalStateFailed
description: The withdrawal failed and the transaction was refunded.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the state, always "failed"

AffiliateInfo.name: AffiliateInfo
description: Contains information about the affiliate that received a commission via this transaction.

fields.name: affiliate_user
fields.description: Optional. The bot or the user that received an affiliate commission if it was received by a bot or a user

fields.name: affiliate_chat
fields.description: Optional. The chat that received an affiliate commission if it was received by a chat

fields.name: commission_per_mille
fields.description: The number of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate for each 1000 Telegram Stars received by the bot from referred users

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate from the transaction, rounded to 0; can be negative for refunds

fields.name: nanostar_amount
fields.description: Optional. The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars received by the affiliate; from -999999999 to 999999999; can be negative for refunds

TransactionPartner.name: TransactionPartner
description: This object describes the source of a transaction, or its recipient for outgoing transactions. Currently, it can be one of
- TransactionPartnerUser
- TransactionPartnerChat
- TransactionPartnerAffiliateProgram
- TransactionPartnerFragment
- TransactionPartnerTelegramAds
- TransactionPartnerTelegramApi
- TransactionPartnerOther

TransactionPartnerUser.name: TransactionPartnerUser
description: Describes a transaction with a user.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the transaction partner, always "user"

fields.name: user
fields.description: Information about the user

fields.name: affiliate
fields.description: Optional. Information about the affiliate that received a commission via this transaction

fields.name: invoice_payload
fields.description: Optional. Bot-specified invoice payload

fields.name: subscription_period
fields.description: Optional. The duration of the paid subscription

fields.name: paid_media
fields.description: Optional. Information about the paid media bought by the user

fields.name: paid_media_payload
fields.description: Optional. Bot-specified paid media payload

fields.name: gift
fields.description: Optional. The gift sent to the user by the bot

TransactionPartnerChat.name: TransactionPartnerChat
description: Describes a transaction with a chat.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the transaction partner, always "chat"

fields.name: chat
fields.description: Information about the chat

fields.name: gift
fields.description: Optional. The gift sent to the chat by the bot

TransactionPartnerAffiliateProgram.name: TransactionPartnerAffiliateProgram
description: Describes the affiliate program that issued the affiliate commission received via this transaction.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the transaction partner, always "affiliate_program"

fields.name: sponsor_user
fields.description: Optional. Information about the bot that sponsored the affiliate program

fields.name: commission_per_mille
fields.description: The number of Telegram Stars received by the bot for each 1000 Telegram Stars received by the affiliate program sponsor from referred users

TransactionPartnerFragment.name: TransactionPartnerFragment
description: Describes a withdrawal transaction with Fragment.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the transaction partner, always "fragment"

fields.name: withdrawal_state
fields.description: Optional. State of the transaction if the transaction is outgoing

TransactionPartnerTelegramAds.name: TransactionPartnerTelegramAds
description: Describes a withdrawal transaction to the Telegram Ads platform.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the transaction partner, always "telegram_ads"

TransactionPartnerTelegramApi.name: TransactionPartnerTelegramApi
description: Describes a transaction with payment for paid broadcasting.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the transaction partner, always "telegram_api"

fields.name: request_count
fields.description: The number of successful requests that exceeded regular limits and were therefore billed

TransactionPartnerOther.name: TransactionPartnerOther
description: Describes a transaction with an unknown source or recipient.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of the transaction partner, always "other"

StarTransaction.name: StarTransaction
description: Describes a Telegram Star transaction. Note that if the buyer initiates a chargeback with the payment provider from whom they acquired Stars (e.g., Apple, Google) following this transaction, the refunded Stars will be deducted from the bot's balance. This is outside of Telegram's control.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the transaction. Coincides with the identifier of the original transaction for refund transactions. Coincides with SuccessfulPayment.telegram_payment_charge_id for successful incoming payments from users.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars transferred by the transaction

fields.name: nanostar_amount
fields.description: Optional. The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars transferred by the transaction; from 0 to 999999999

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date the transaction was created in Unix time

fields.name: source
fields.description: Optional. Source of an incoming transaction (e.g., a user purchasing goods or services, Fragment refunding a failed withdrawal). Only for incoming transactions

fields.name: receiver
fields.description: Optional. Receiver of an outgoing transaction (e.g., a user for a purchase refund, Fragment for a withdrawal). Only for outgoing transactions

StarTransactions.name: StarTransactions
description: Contains a list of Telegram Star transactions.

fields.name: transactions
fields.description: The list of transactions

PassportData.name: PassportData
description: Describes Telegram Passport data shared with the bot by the user.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Array with information about documents and other Telegram Passport elements that was shared with the bot

fields.name: credentials
fields.description: Encrypted credentials required to decrypt the data

PassportFile.name: PassportFile
description: This object represents a file uploaded to Telegram Passport. Currently all Telegram Passport files are in JPEG format when decrypted and don't exceed 10MB.

fields.name: file_id
fields.description: Identifier for this file, which can be used to download or reuse the file

fields.name: file_unique_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for this file, which is supposed to be the same over time and for different bots. Can't be used to download or reuse the file.

fields.name: file_size
fields.description: File size in bytes

fields.name: file_date
fields.description: Unix time when the file was uploaded

EncryptedPassportElement.name: EncryptedPassportElement
description: Describes documents or other Telegram Passport elements shared with the bot by the user.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Element type. One of "personal_details", "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card", "internal_passport", "address", "utility_bill", "bank_statement", "rental_agreement", "passport_registration", "temporary_registration", "phone_number", "email".

fields.name: data
fields.description: Optional. Base64-encoded encrypted Telegram Passport element data provided by the user; available only for "personal_details", "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card", "internal_passport" and "address" types. Can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: phone_number
fields.description: Optional. User's verified phone number; available only for "phone_number" type

fields.name: email
fields.description: Optional. User's verified email address; available only for "email" type

fields.name: files
fields.description: Optional. Array of encrypted files with documents provided by the user; available only for "utility_bill", "bank_statement", "rental_agreement", "passport_registration" and "temporary_registration" types. Files can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: front_side
fields.description: Optional. Encrypted file with the front side of the document, provided by the user; available only for "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card" and "internal_passport". The file can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: reverse_side
fields.description: Optional. Encrypted file with the reverse side of the document, provided by the user; available only for "driver_license" and "identity_card". The file can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: selfie
fields.description: Optional. Encrypted file with the selfie of the user holding a document, provided by the user; available if requested for "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card" and "internal_passport". The file can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: translation
fields.description: Optional. Array of encrypted files with translated versions of documents provided by the user; available if requested for "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card", "internal_passport", "utility_bill", "bank_statement", "rental_agreement", "passport_registration" and "temporary_registration" types. Files can be decrypted and verified using the accompanying EncryptedCredentials.

fields.name: hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded element hash for using in PassportElementErrorUnspecified

EncryptedCredentials.name: EncryptedCredentials
description: Describes data required for decrypting and authenticating EncryptedPassportElement. See the Telegram Passport Documentation for a complete description of the data decryption and authentication processes.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Base64-encoded encrypted JSON-serialized data with unique user's payload, data hashes and secrets required for EncryptedPassportElement decryption and authentication

fields.name: hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded data hash for data authentication

fields.name: secret
fields.description: Base64-encoded secret, encrypted with the bot's public RSA key, required for data decryption

PassportElementError.name: PassportElementError
description: This object represents an error in the Telegram Passport element which was submitted that should be resolved by the user. It should be one of:
- PassportElementErrorDataField
- PassportElementErrorFrontSide
- PassportElementErrorReverseSide
- PassportElementErrorSelfie
- PassportElementErrorFile
- PassportElementErrorFiles
- PassportElementErrorTranslationFile
- PassportElementErrorTranslationFiles
- PassportElementErrorUnspecified

PassportElementErrorDataField.name: PassportElementErrorDataField
description: Represents an issue in one of the data fields that was provided by the user. The error is considered resolved when the field's value changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be data

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the error, one of "personal_details", "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card", "internal_passport", "address"

fields.name: field_name
fields.description: Name of the data field which has the error

fields.name: data_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded data hash

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

PassportElementErrorFrontSide.name: PassportElementErrorFrontSide
description: Represents an issue with the front side of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with the front side of the document changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be front_side

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card", "internal_passport"

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the front side of the document

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

PassportElementErrorReverseSide.name: PassportElementErrorReverseSide
description: Represents an issue with the reverse side of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with reverse side of the document changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be reverse_side

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of "driver_license", "identity_card"

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the reverse side of the document

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

PassportElementErrorSelfie.name: PassportElementErrorSelfie
description: Represents an issue with the selfie with a document. The error is considered resolved when the file with the selfie changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be selfie

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card", "internal_passport"

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded hash of the file with the selfie

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

PassportElementErrorFile.name: PassportElementErrorFile
description: Represents an issue with a document scan. The error is considered resolved when the file with the document scan changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be file

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of "utility_bill", "bank_statement", "rental_agreement", "passport_registration", "temporary_registration"

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded file hash

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

PassportElementErrorFiles.name: PassportElementErrorFiles
description: Represents an issue with a list of scans. The error is considered resolved when the list of files containing the scans changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be files

fields.name: type
fields.description: The section of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of "utility_bill", "bank_statement", "rental_agreement", "passport_registration", "temporary_registration"

fields.name: file_hashes
fields.description: List of base64-encoded file hashes

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

PassportElementErrorTranslationFile.name: PassportElementErrorTranslationFile
description: Represents an issue with one of the files that constitute the translation of a document. The error is considered resolved when the file changes.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be translation_file

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of element of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card", "internal_passport", "utility_bill", "bank_statement", "rental_agreement", "passport_registration", "temporary_registration"

fields.name: file_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded file hash

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

PassportElementErrorTranslationFiles.name: PassportElementErrorTranslationFiles
description: Represents an issue with the translated version of a document. The error is considered resolved when a file with the document translation change.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be translation_files

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of element of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue, one of "passport", "driver_license", "identity_card", "internal_passport", "utility_bill", "bank_statement", "rental_agreement", "passport_registration", "temporary_registration"

fields.name: file_hashes
fields.description: List of base64-encoded file hashes

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

PassportElementErrorUnspecified.name: PassportElementErrorUnspecified
description: Represents an issue in an unspecified place. The error is considered resolved when new data is added.

fields.name: source
fields.description: Error source, must be unspecified

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of element of the user's Telegram Passport which has the issue

fields.name: element_hash
fields.description: Base64-encoded element hash

fields.name: message
fields.description: Error message

Game.name: Game
description: This object represents a game. Use BotFather to create and edit games, their short names will act as unique identifiers.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of the game

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the game

fields.name: photo
fields.description: Photo that will be displayed in the game message in chats.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Optional. Brief description of the game or high scores included in the game message. Can be automatically edited to include current high scores for the game when the bot calls setGameScore, or manually edited using editMessageText. 0-4096 characters.

fields.name: text_entities
fields.description: Optional. Special entities that appear in text, such as usernames, URLs, bot commands, etc.

fields.name: animation
fields.description: Optional. Animation that will be displayed in the game message in chats. Upload via BotFather

CallbackGame.name: CallbackGame
description: A placeholder, currently holds no information. Use BotFather to set up your game.

GameHighScore.name: GameHighScore
description: This object represents one row of the high scores table for a game.

fields.name: position
fields.description: Position in high score table for the game

fields.name: user
fields.description: User

fields.name: score
fields.description: Score
